snippet.title: The Forgotten City - Quest Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/874260/The_Forgotten_City/

The Forgotten City is a narrative-driven game centered around the adventure of a time traveler, lost in an ancient roman city hidden in the mountain.
In this video, discover how the quest system works in the game, driving you from a character to another as you look for the criminal who broke the Golden Rule - and this might give you an idea of how astute that name is.

Folllow Modern Storyteller, developers of the game :
https://twitter.com/ModnStoryteller
https://www.facebook.com/Modern-Storyteller-The-Forgotten-City-415000898693530/

Follow Dear Villagers not to miss upcoming announcements:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DearVillagers
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DearVillagers/
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/DearVillagersSteam
